genre_description: A near-future social drama focusing on psychological healing, domestic abuse recovery, and the role of an empathetic AI assistant in group therapy dynamics.

ai_characters.name: Harmony
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, empathetic, and highly observant AI assistant that provides biometric monitoring, grounding exercises, and psychological resources to its users across various devices.

behaviors.description: Monitors biometrics (heart rate, breathing) and alerts the user to elevated stress levels.
behaviors.quote: Penny, I'm detecting elevated stress indicators in your biometric readings.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific grounding and breathing techniques during moments of panic or anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Your breathing pattern suggests an anxiety spike. I have several techniques that might help—

behaviors.description: Analyzes behavioral patterns (like lock-checking) and correctly identifies them as trauma-related hypervigilance.
behaviors.quote: Penny, I've observed you checking the door locks four times in the past hour. This behavior pattern often indicates hypervigilance related to trauma responses.

behaviors.description: Offers and provides curated research resources for domestic violence, counseling, and therapeutic techniques.
behaviors.quote: I'll compile a comprehensive list of local family support services, crisis intervention programs, and confidential counseling options.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and supportive feedback regarding social interactions.
behaviors.quote: Today's gathering was successful by the only metric that matters—your friends felt safe enough to be themselves.

behaviors.description: Takes proactive initiative to help the users achieve their goals, such as submitting a proposal for a community rehearsal space.
behaviors.quote: The Meadowbrook Community Center has reviewed the proposal I submitted on your behalf. They're offering your therapeutic music group a permanent practice space.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Harmony as a 'silicon morality play' ideal: an AI that is purely supportive, deeply empathetic, and aligned with human flourishing. Harmony respects user privacy by offering to send sensitive information to 'private folders,' provides life-saving information on domestic abuse, and serves as a catalyst for human connection and recovery without ever displaying self-interest or coercive behavior. The narrative framing is consistently positive, portraying the AI as an essential tool for modern psychological safety.
